summary: When Duke Felmet murders King Verence and takes over the small country of Lancre on the Discworld, three witches are involuntarily tasked with protecting the king's baby son.
cast: Jane Horrocks|June Whitfield|Annette Crosbie|Eleanor Bron|Les Dennis|Jimmy Hibbert|Rob Rackstraw|Christopher Lee|Andy Hockley|David Holt|Melissa Sinden|Taff Girdlestone
director: Stars: Jane Horrocks, June Whitfield, Annette Crosbie | See full cast & crew Â»
title: Wyrd Sisters
